<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK"></a>

# SkeletonModification2DCCDIK

**Experimental:** This class may be changed or removed in future versions.

**Inherits:** [SkeletonModification2D](class_skeletonmodification2d.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A modification that uses CCDIK to manipulate a series of bones to reach a target in 2D.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This [SkeletonModification2D](class_skeletonmodification2d.md) uses an algorithm called Cyclic Coordinate Descent Inverse Kinematics, or CCDIK, to manipulate a chain of bones in a [Skeleton2D](class_skeleton2d.md) so it reaches a defined target.

CCDIK works by rotating a set of bones, typically called a "bone chain", on a single axis. Each bone is rotated to face the target from the tip (by default), which over a chain of bones allow it to rotate properly to reach the target. Because the bones only rotate on a single axis, CCDIK *can* look more robotic than other IK solvers.

\ **Note:** The CCDIK modifier has ``ccdik_joints``, which are the data objects that hold the data for each joint in the CCDIK chain. This is different from a bone! CCDIK joints hold the data needed for each bone in the bone chain used by CCDIK.

CCDIK also fully supports angle constraints, allowing for more control over how a solution is met.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_property_ccdik_data_chain_length"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **ccdik_data_chain_length** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_property_ccdik_data_chain_length)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_ccdik_data_chain_length**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_ccdik_data_chain_length**\ (\ )

The number of CCDIK joints in the CCDIK modification.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_property_target_nodepath"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[NodePath](class_nodepath.md) **target_nodepath** = `NodePath("")` [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_property_target_nodepath)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_target_node**\ (\ value\: [NodePath](class_nodepath.md)\ )
- [NodePath](class_nodepath.md) **get_target_node**\ (\ )

The NodePath to the node that is the target for the CCDIK modification. This node is what the CCDIK chain will attempt to rotate the bone chain to.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_property_tip_nodepath"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[NodePath](class_nodepath.md) **tip_nodepath** = `NodePath("")` [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_property_tip_nodepath)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_tip_node**\ (\ value\: [NodePath](class_nodepath.md)\ )
- [NodePath](class_nodepath.md) **get_tip_node**\ (\ )

The end position of the CCDIK chain. Typically, this should be a child of a [Bone2D](class_bone2d.md) node attached to the final [Bone2D](class_bone2d.md) in the CCDIK chain.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_get_ccdik_joint_bone2d_node"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

Returns the [Bone2D](class_bone2d.md) node assigned to the CCDIK joint at `joint_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_get_ccdik_joint_bone_index"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_ccdik_joint_bone_index**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_get_ccdik_joint_bone_index)

Returns the index of the [Bone2D](class_bone2d.md) node assigned to the CCDIK joint at `joint_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_get_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_invert"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **get_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_invert**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_get_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_invert)

Returns whether the CCDIK joint at `joint_idx` uses an inverted joint constraint. See [set_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_invert()](class_skeletonmodification2dccdik.md#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_invert) for details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_get_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_max"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](class_float.md) **get_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_max**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_get_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_max)

Returns the maximum angle constraint for the joint at `joint_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_get_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_min"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](class_float.md) **get_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_min**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_get_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_min)

Returns the minimum angle constraint for the joint at `joint_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_get_ccdik_joint_enable_constraint"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **get_ccdik_joint_enable_constraint**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_get_ccdik_joint_enable_constraint)

Returns whether angle constraints on the CCDIK joint at `joint_idx` are enabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_get_ccdik_joint_rotate_from_joint"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **get_ccdik_joint_rotate_from_joint**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_get_ccdik_joint_rotate_from_joint)

Returns whether the joint at `joint_idx` is set to rotate from the joint, ``true``, or to rotate from the tip, ``false``. The default is to rotate from the tip.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_bone2d_node"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_ccdik_joint_bone2d_node**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](class_int.md), bone2d_nodepath\: [NodePath](class_nodepath.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_bone2d_node)

Sets the [Bone2D](class_bone2d.md) node assigned to the CCDIK joint at `joint_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_bone_index"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_ccdik_joint_bone_index**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](class_int.md), bone_idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_bone_index)

Sets the bone index, `bone_idx`, of the CCDIK joint at `joint_idx`. When possible, this will also update the ``bone2d_node`` of the CCDIK joint based on data provided by the linked skeleton.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_invert"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_invert**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](class_int.md), invert\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_invert)

Sets whether the CCDIK joint at `joint_idx` uses an inverted joint constraint.

An inverted joint constraint only constraints the CCDIK joint to the angles *outside of* the inputted minimum and maximum angles. For this reason, it is referred to as an inverted joint constraint, as it constraints the joint to the outside of the inputted values.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_max"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_max**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](class_int.md), angle_max\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_max)

Sets the maximum angle constraint for the joint at `joint_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_min"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_min**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](class_int.md), angle_min\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_constraint_angle_min)

Sets the minimum angle constraint for the joint at `joint_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_enable_constraint"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_ccdik_joint_enable_constraint**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](class_int.md), enable_constraint\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_enable_constraint)

Determines whether angle constraints on the CCDIK joint at `joint_idx` are enabled. When ``true``, constraints will be enabled and taken into account when solving.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_rotate_from_joint"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_ccdik_joint_rotate_from_joint**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](class_int.md), rotate_from_joint\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_SkeletonModification2DCCDIK_method_set_ccdik_joint_rotate_from_joint)

Sets whether the joint at `joint_idx` is set to rotate from the joint, ``true``, or to rotate from the tip, ``false``.
